full_summary:
### Remotely Piloted Aircraft Systems (RPAS) Procurement

#### Call for Proposals
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is soliciting proposals for the supply and delivery of remotely piloted aircraft systems (RPAS) that meet the mandatory performance specifications outlined below.

#### Background
The RCMP's RPAS Program aims to equip its teams with electrically powered, high-endurance RPAS for use in various law enforcement operations. The selected bidder will be expected to supply two RPAS systems to the RCMP's D Division facility in Winnipeg, Manitoba, with the option to purchase up to six additional systems and thirty battery packs for delivery to various RCMP locations across Canada within two years of contract award.

#### Terms and Conditions
* The tender closing date is May 27, 2024 at 14:00 EDT.
* Bids received after the specified closing time will be considered non-responsive.
* Proposal submissions must be accompanied by all required supporting documentation.
* The selected bidder will be responsible for providing training on the use of the RPAS systems.

#### Performance Specifications
The RPAS systems must meet the following minimum mandatory performance specifications:

* Electrically powered
* High endurance
* Meeting the performance specifications outlined in the attached documentation

#### Procurement Process
The procurement process will be conducted through a competitive bidding process, with the lowest price being the selection criterion.

#### Contact Information
For further information and to submit a proposal, please contact:

Andrew Hemy, SPAC/PSPC
